trans-unit.source: A key is a piece of information that controls the cryptographic process and permits an encrypted string to be decoded. trans-unit.source: A very basic test will probably trick you into believing that an SQL database is faster, but in 99% of the cases, this is only true while you only have a few current sessions. As the sessions count and server loads increase - which is the time when it matters - the file system will consistently outperform almost all relational database setups.
trans-unit.target: 一个非常基本的测试可能会欺骗你,让你相信SQL数据库更快,但在99%的情况下,这只是在你只有几个当前会话的时候才是真的。随着会话数和服务器负载的增加--这时才是最重要的时候--文件系统的性能将持续优于几乎所有关系型数据库的设置。

trans-unit.source: An encryption key is a piece of information that controls the cryptographic process and permits a plain-text string to be encrypted, and afterwards - decrypted. It is the secret “ingredient” in the whole process that allows you to be the only one who is able to decrypt data that you’ve decided to hide from the eyes of the public. After one key is used to encrypt data, that same key provides the only means to decrypt it, so not only must you chose one carefully, but you must not lose it or you will also lose access to the data.
trans-unit.target: 的加密密钥是一条信息控制密码处理并且允许纯文本字符串进行加密，之后-解密。这是整个过程中的秘密“成分”，它使您成为唯一能够解密您决定隐藏在公众视野之外的数据的人。在使用一个密钥对数据进行加密之后，该密钥才是解密数据的唯一方法，因此，不仅您必须谨慎选择一个密钥，而且还不能丢失它，否则也将失去对数据的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Another good security practice is to only leave your index.php and “assets” (e.g. .js, css and image files) under your server’s webroot directory (most commonly named “htdocs/”). These are the only files that you would need to be accessible from the web.

trans-unit.source: Another important thing that you should know, is to make sure that you don’t use a publicly-readable or shared directory for storing your session files. Make sure that only you have access to see the contents of your chosen sess_save_path directory. Otherwise, anybody who can do that, can also steal any of the current sessions (also known as “session fixation” attack).
trans-unit.target: 您还应该知道的另一件事是，确保不要使用公共可读或共享目录来存储会话文件。确保只有您才能查看所选sess_save_path目录的内容。否则，任何能够做到这一点的人都可以窃取当前的任何会话（也称为“会话固定”攻击）。

trans-unit.source: Because MCrypt and OpenSSL (also called drivers throughout this document) each support different sets of encryption algorithms and often implement them in different ways, our Encryption library is designed to use them in a portable fashion, or in other words - it enables you to use them interchangeably, at least for the ciphers supported by both drivers.

trans-unit.source: Because of how MCrypt works, if you fail to provide a key with the appropriate length, you might end up using a different algorithm than the one configured, so be really careful with that!

trans-unit.source: By default CodeIgniter runs all transactions in Strict Mode. When strict mode is enabled, if you are running multiple groups of transactions, if one group fails all groups will be rolled back. If strict mode is disabled, each group is treated independently, meaning a failure of one group will not affect any others.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,CodeIgniter以严格模式运行所有事务。当严格模式被启用时,如果你正在运行多组事务,如果一个组失败,所有的组将被回滚。如果严格模式被禁用,每个组将被独立处理,这意味着一个组的失败将不会影响其他组。

trans-unit.source: By default, URLs in CodeIgniter are designed to be search-engine and human friendly. Rather than using the standard “query string” approach to URLs that is synonymous with dynamic systems, CodeIgniter uses a segment-based approach:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，CodeIgniter中的URL被设计为搜索引擎且对人类友好。CodeIgniter并未使用与动态系统同义的URL的标准“查询字符串”方法，而是使用基于段的方法：

trans-unit.source: By default, all of the raw data will be printed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,所有的原始数据都会被打印出来。

trans-unit.source: By default, hidden files will not be included in the returned array. To override this behavior, you may set a third parameter to true (boolean):
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,隐藏的文件不会被包含在返回的数组中。要覆盖这个行为,你可以将第三个参数设置为true(布尔值)。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Files Driver will be used when a session is initialized, because it is the most safe choice and is expected to work everywhere (virtually every environment has a file system).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在初始化会话时将使用文件驱动程序，因为这是最安全的选择，并且有望在任何地方都可以使用（实际上，每个环境都有一个文件系统）。

trans-unit.source: By default, the index.php file will be included in your URLs:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，index.php文件将包含在您的URL中：

trans-unit.source: By default, the Encryption Library will use the AES-128 cipher in CBC mode, using your configured encryption_key and SHA512 HMAC authentication.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，加密库将在CBC模式下使用AES-128密码，并使用您配置的encryption_key和SHA512 HMAC身份验证。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Form Validation class adds a paragraph tag (<p>) around each error message shown. You can either change these delimiters globally, individually, or change the defaults in a config file.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Form Validation类在显示的每个错误消息周围添加一个段落标签（<p>）。您可以分别全局更改这些定界符，也可以在配置文件中更改默认定界符。

trans-unit.source: By default, the URI segment will use the starting index for the items you are paginating. If you prefer to show the the actual page number, set this to TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,URI段将使用您正在分页的项目的起始索引。如果您希望显示实际页码,请将此设置为 "true"。

trans-unit.source: By setting the second parameter to TRUE (boolean) the function will return the database object.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置第二个参数为TRUE(布尔值),函数将返回数据库对象。

trans-unit.source: By using a multi-dimensional array, as shown below, it is possible to add multiple products to the cart in one action. This is useful in cases where you wish to allow people to select from among several items on the same page.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用多维数组,如下图所示,可以在一个动作中添加多个产品到购物车中。这在您希望让人们在同一页面上从多个项目中进行选择的情况下非常有用。

trans-unit.source: CAST-128 / CAST-5 is also listed in both the portable and driver-specific ciphers list. This is because OpenSSL’s implementation doesn’t appear to be working correctly with key sizes of 80 bits and lower.
trans-unit.target: CAST-128 / CAST-5也在便携式和特定于驱动程序的密码列表中列出。这是因为使用80位及更低的密钥大小时，OpenSSL的实现似乎无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: CSRF stands for Cross-Site Request Forgery, which is the process of an attacker tricking their victim into unknowingly submitting a request.
trans-unit.target: CSRF是Cross-Site Request Forgery的缩写,即攻击者在不知情的情况下欺骗受害者提交请求的过程。

trans-unit.source: Cache files DO NOT expire. Any queries that have been cached will remain cached until you delete them. The caching system permits you clear caches associated with individual pages, or you can delete the entire collection of cache files. Typically you’ll want to use the housekeeping functions described below to delete cache files after certain events take place, like when you’ve added new information to your database.
trans-unit.target: 缓存文件不会过期。在删除查询之前，所有已缓存的查询都将保持缓存状态。缓存系统允许您清除与各个页面关联的缓存，也可以删除整个缓存文件集合。通常，在某些事件发生后，例如当您向数据库中添加新信息时，您将需要使用下面描述的内务管理功能删除缓存文件。

trans-unit.source: Cached calls are cumulative. If you make 2 cached select() calls, and then 2 uncached select() calls, this will result in 4 select() calls. There are three Caching functions available:
trans-unit.target: 缓存调用是累积的。如果您进行了2次缓存的select()调用,然后又进行了2次未缓存的select()调用,这将导致4次select()调用。有三个Caching函数可用。

trans-unit.source: Caches the current page for the specified amount of minutes.
trans-unit.target: 缓存当前页面的指定分钟数。

trans-unit.source: Caching can be enabled on a per-page basis, and you can set the length of time that a page should remain cached before being refreshed. When a page is loaded for the first time, the cache file will be written to your application/cache folder. On subsequent page loads the cache file will be retrieved and sent to the requesting user’s browser. If it has expired, it will be deleted and refreshed before being sent to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 可以逐页启用缓存，并且可以设置刷新页面之前应保留缓存的时间长度。首次加载页面时，缓存文件将被写入您的应用程序/缓存文件夹。在随后的页面加载中，将检索缓存文件并将其发送到发出请求的用户的浏览器。如果已过期，它将被删除并刷新，然后再发送到浏览器。

trans-unit.source: Caching is enabled in three steps:
trans-unit.target: 缓存的启用分为三个步骤。

trans-unit.source: Changing the Look of Your Table
Check for the existence of a database.

Check if the string is long enough, separate the HMAC out of it and validate if it is correct (this is done in a way that prevents timing attacks against it). Return FALSE if either of the checks fails.
trans-unit.target: 检查字符串是否足够长,将HMAC从其中分离出来,并验证其是否正确(这是为了防止针对它的定时攻击)。如果其中一项检查失败,则返回false。
